en: "Those were the times where you could teach them something. And all that free labour!"

en: "Snow shovels?! My natural enemy! Just you wait

en: "What did I tell you? It's just not like it used to be back in the days

en: "Oho! Now we're talking! Then I'll bring bigger guns
